lead_paragraph: Rebuffed in their effort to have the charges dismissed, Mr. Cosby’s lawyers are expected to battle the prosecution over what evidence may be admitted.

headline.print_headline: Judge Decides That a Sexual Assault Case Against Cosby Can Proceed
headline.main: Bill Cosby Sexual Assault Trial Can Proceed, Judge Rules

snippet: Rebuffed in their effort to have the charges dismissed, Mr. Cosby’s lawyers are expected to battle the prosecution over what evidence may be admitted.
abstract: Pennsylvania Judge Elizabeth A McHugh rules sufficient evidence exists for sexual assault case against Bill Cosby to move forward; he will stand trial on charges he drugged and sexually assaulted Andrea Constand, woman he once mentored, in 2004.
